story.kicker_image_caption: Amrita Rao and Aditi Vasudev in a still from Meri Awaaz Hi Pehchaan Hai.
story.storykicker: Amrita Rao and Aditi Vasudev, who play two warring sisters in &TV's Meri Awaaz Hi Pehchaan Hai, are not even shooting together.
story.storybody:
Amrita Rao and Aditi Vasudev, who play two warring sisters in &TV's Meri Awaaz Hi Pehchaan Hai--Kalyani and Keti, have taken their on-screen bitterness to real life. A source from the sets of the soap told Mid-Day that the actresses are not on talking terms. In fact their tiff has turned so ugly that the two have refused to shoot together.

To solve the problem, a second director has been roped in to manage the shoots.

"A few weeks ago, Amrita and Aditi refused to shoot together. The makers were worried sick because the actresses still have some scenes together," a source told the Mumbai-based tabloid.

Also read: The real reason why Amrita Rao signed on Meri Awaaz Hi Pehchaan Hai

Now the new director Mohammad Eijaz shoots with Aditi, while Kushal Zaveri the original director shoots with Amrita. But the arrangement has become a big pain for makers. "With this, the two don't even cross each other's paths on the sets. They shoot separately and it has now become a headache for the makers to stick to this arrangement everyday," adds the source.

Aditi refused to comment on the issue, and Amrita was unreachable.
